summary:
(This is my first Mod)

This is just a simple mod that allows you to wear circlets (also dragon priest masks) with robes that have a built in hood. It does NOT allow you to wear them with the separate hoods/hats.
descriptionHtml:
(This is my first Mod)

This is just a simple mod that allows you to wear circlets (also dragon priest masks) with robes that have a built in hood. It does NOT allow you to wear them with the separate hoods/hats.

For a mod that allows circlets with anything hooded, please visit my other page: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12235

The changes apply to:

Clothes (Green clothes with built-in hood) - 00017695
Hooded Black Mage Robes - 0010710C
Hooded Black Robes - 00107108
Hooded Brown Robes - 0010CFE4
Hooded Green Robes - 0010CFEC
Hooded Grey Robes - 0010CFEA
Hooded Mage Robes - 0010710B
Hooded Mage Robes - 00107109
Hooded Monk Robes - 00107106
Hooded Necromancer Robes - 0010710D
Hooded Red Robes - 0010CFEB
Hooded Thalmor Robes - 0010C698

Note: The hooded Archmage Robes already has this ability, so there was no need to add it. If, for some reason, Beth changes that, let me know and I will add it to this list.
Also, you can wear Dragon-priest masks with these robes since they are considered circlets.

Please let me know if you find that I missed any, and I will update it ASAP.

My file on Steam:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10217
author: Subvert5

files.name: BRrobecirclets_v1_1
files.changelogHtml: Using the \"Weapon and Armor Fix\" mod changes the ability to wear a circlet with the Archmage Robes. I have enabled it, again. NOTE!!!: You must make sure that this mod is loaded AFTER the fixed mod (make sure it is further down in the \"Data Files\")
